item.title: Install Hugo
item.description: To use this theme you will need to have Hugo installed. If you don’t already have Hugo installed please follow the official installation guide Check Hugo Version This theme uses Hugo Pipes to compile SCSS and minify assets.

item.title: Project Motivation
item.description: Syntax highlighting and menus can be configured via config.toml.

item.title: Install Theme
item.description: Create a new Hugo site hugo new site mynewsite This will create a fresh Hugo site in the folder mynewsite. Install theme Copy or git clone this theme into the sites themes folder mynewsite/themes

item.title: Objectives
item.description: Our group will focus on the following objectives: Visualize density of the COVID-19 cases in Hong Kong by performing relevant exploratory data analysis. Conduct global and local spatial analysis to find out spatial correlation patterns and influencing factors.

item.title: Configuration
item.description: Syntax highlighting and menus can be configured via config.toml.

item.title: Hugo Whisper
item.description: Whisper is a minimal documentation theme built for Hugo. The design & functionality is intentionally minimal.

item.title: Literature Review
item.description: Spatial statistics and influencing factors of the novel coronavirus Taken from: (By: Yongzhu Xiong, Yunpeng Wang, Feng Chen, Mingyong Zhu) Yongzhu Xiong, Yunpeng Wang, Feng Chen et al. Spatial statistics and influencing factors of the novel coronavirus pneumonia 2019 epidemic in Hubei Province, China, 06 April 2020, PREPRINT (Version 2) available at Research Square [+https://doi.

item.title: Data Preparation & Analysis
item.description: Data Preparation Data Collection Data of the cases of coronavirus in Hong Kong, the quarantine building list, means of transport, population, as well as testing, are obtained from data.

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.
